metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19655 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stack-based buffer overflow in the find_green() function of dcraw through 9.28, as used in ufraw-batch and many other products, may allow a remote attacker to cause a control-flow hijack, denial-of-service, or unspecified other impact via a maliciously crafted raw photo file.

criterions.comment: dcraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
